text: Otto Carius (27 May 1922 - 24 January 2015) was a German former Nazi tank commander. He destroyed over 150 foreign tanks. He received the Knight's Cross of the Iron Cross with Oak Leaves. After the war, Carius worked as a pharmacist. He also wrote books about his experiences during the war. Carius was born in Zweibr√ºcken, Weimar Germany.
